Creating input files¶

  • Pymatgen relax sets are really useful as they also come with e.g. useful MAGMON settings

Common problems¶

  • In my opinion, VASP is pretty silent when stopping a run altough not reaching

the convergence criteria. Double checking the forces is essential here. * To avoid stack size errors, you might find it useful to set

ulimit -s unlimited

in your .bashrc
